snippet.title: Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden is now available to pre-purchase on Steam® and Nintendo Switch™! Coming soon to PlayStation®4.

From the creative minds of YOKO TARO, Keiichi Okabe and Kimihiko Fujisaka.

Available September 13th! Pre-purchase on Steam® and Nintendo Switch™ before October 3rd to receive  DLCS: ""Iron Avatar"" and ""Somber Girl's Abstract Pattern""! 
PlayStation® users will receive the ""Iron Avatar"" and ""Somber Girl's Abstract Pattern"" if they purchase before October 3rd.
